LanguageData.MeatEating_Abhorrent.label: 혐오스러움
LanguageData.MeatEating_Abhorrent.description: Eating meat of any kind is deeply evil.
LanguageData.MeatEating_Disapproved.label: 못마땅함
LanguageData.MeatEating_Disapproved.description: Eating meat of any kind should be avoided.
LanguageData.MeatEating_Horrible.label: horrible
LanguageData.MeatEating_Horrible.description: Eating meat of any kind is a horrible act.
LanguageData.MeatEating_NonMeat_Abhorrent.label: strictly required
LanguageData.MeatEating_NonMeat_Abhorrent.description: If a meal doesn't have meat, the person who eats it must be morally deficient.
LanguageData.MeatEating_NonMeat_Disapproved.label: mildly required
LanguageData.MeatEating_NonMeat_Disapproved.descripti: Every meal ought to have meat.
LanguageData.MeatEating_NonMeat_Horrible.label: seriously required
